name: Nam Bo Boutique Hotel
address: 1 Ngo Quyen, Cần Thơ, Việt Nam
description:
Tọa lạc cách Trung tâm thương mại Vincom Xuân Khánh 2.1 km và Can Tho Stadium 2.4 km, Nam Bo Boutique Hotel cung cấp các phòng ở Cần Thơ. Chỗ nghỉ này có các tiện nghi như dịch vụ phòng và bàn bán tour, cùng với Wi-Fi miễn phí ở toàn bộ chỗ nghỉ. Khách sạn có sân hiên và nhìn ra thành phố, ngoài ra du khách có thể thưởng thức bữa ăn tại nhà hàng hoặc đồ uống tại quầy bar.

Khách sạn sẽ cung cấp cho khách các phòng được trang bị điều hòa có tủ quần áo, ấm đun nước, minibar, két an toàn, TV màn hình phẳng và phòng tắm riêng với vòi sen. Tại Nam Bo Boutique Hotel, phòng nào cũng có ga trải giường và khăn tắm.

Các điểm tham quan nổi tiếng gần chỗ nghỉ bao gồm Bến Ninh Kiều, Vincom Plaza Hùng Vương và Bảo tàng Cần Thơ. Sân bay gần nhất là Sân bay Quốc tế Cần Thơ, cách Nam Bo Boutique Hotel 10 km, đồng thời chỗ nghỉ có cung cấp dịch vụ đưa đón sân bay mất phí.

review.rating: Tôi sẽ giới thiệu với bạn bè
review.comment_positive: Vị trí đẹp, ngắm bến Ninh Kiều, khách sạn tạo điều kiện checkin checkout rất thuận lợi
Decor khá đẹp
Ban công view đẹp lắm. Phòng trang trí rất hoài cổ.
review.comment_negative: Xin hãy lắp vòi xịt ở nhà wc :(.

review.rating: Thoải mái , sẽ còn ghe thăm
review.comment_positive: Phòng rộng, yên tĩnh và thoải mái
Phòng rộng và thoải mái yên tĩnh

review.room_type: Phòng 2 Giường Đơn Nhìn Ra Thành Phố
review.comment_positive: The location is very good, the room was large and luminous, no noise. Staff were very welcoming and helpful.

review.rating: Excellent stay and can highly recommend.
review.comment_positive:
Fantastic location . Very traditional hotel with very friendly staff who were always happy to assist . 
Restaurant on top floor superb service and location .

Excellent location.
Nice and kind staff.
Early check-in available.
Roomy one bedroom apartment with tasteful decoration and furnishing. 
A large supermarket is 5 mins away.
review.comment_negative: The tap in the sitting room isn't working.

review.room_type: Phòng 2 Giường Đơn Nhìn Ra Thành Phố
review.comment_positive: Location . Friendly service. Large room.

review.rating: Nan Bo Boutique Hotel will not disappoint
review.comment_positive: Excellent location near the Ninh Kien wharf diagonally across from the 7.2 metre Ho Chi Minh statue located on the walking river promenade.  Within walking distance of the night market and street food stalls but you can also eat at their downstairs restaurant or upstairs at L’Escale with excellent views.   Both served delicious food. Many thanks to Yen who went out of her way to welcome us and all her help in getting us transportation to our next location.  Yen you are a gem.  Special thanks also to our cleaner Emmy who kept the room spotless and for the added fruit plate touches.  This is a well managed hotel, rooms are a nice size (recommend corner balcony room with views of river and promenade), access to a safe, nice decor, comfortable bed.  Glad we stayed in Can Tho for 5 days.  A treat.

review.rating: Excellent stay and can highly recommend.
review.comment_positive:
Fantastic location . Very traditional hotel with very friendly staff who were always happy to assist . 
Restaurant on top floor superb service and location .

Excellent location.
Nice and kind staff.
Early check-in available.
Roomy one bedroom apartment with tasteful decoration and furnishing.

review.comment_negative: The tap in the sitting room isn't working.

review.room_type: Phòng 2 Giường Đơn Nhìn Ra Thành Phố
review.comment_positive: Location . Friendly service. Large room.

review.rating: Nan Bo Boutique Hotel will not disappoint
review.comment_positive: Excellent location near the Ninh Kien wharf diagonally across from the 7.2 metre Ho Chi Minh statue located on the walking river promenade.  Within walking distance of the night market and street food stalls but you can also eat at their downstairs restaurant or upstairs at L’Escale with excellent views.   Both served delicious food. Many thanks to Yen who went out of her way to welcome us and all her help in getting us transportation to our next location.  Yen you are a gem.  Special thanks also to our cleaner Emmy who kept the room spotless and for the added fruit plate touches.  This is a well managed hotel, rooms are a nice size (recommend corner balcony room with views of river and promenade), access to a safe, nice decor, comfortable bed.  Glad we stayed in Can Tho for 5 days.  A treat.
